sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The foot-post of Douer With his packet stuft full of strange and merry petitions. Straunge foot-post Nixon, Anthony.
[50] p.
Printed by Edw: Allde, and are to be solde by Iohn Deane, dwelli[n]g iust vnder Temple barre, London : 1616.
By Anthony Nixon. With a title-page woodcut. Imprint slightly mutilated in only known copy. Signatures: [A]² (-[A]2 or [A]1) B-G⁴. A variant (or reissue with cancel quire [A]?) of: A straunge foot-post, 1613. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The foot-post of Douer With his packet stuft full of strange and merry petitions. Straunge foot-post Nixon, Anthony.
[50] p.
Printed by Edw: Allde, and are to be solde by Iohn Deane, dwelli[n]g iust vnder Temple barre, London : 1616.
By Anthony Nixon. With a title-page woodcut. Imprint slightly mutilated in only known copy. Signatures: [A]² (-[A]2 or [A]1) B-G⁴. A variant (or reissue with cancel quire [A]?) of: A straunge foot-post, 1613. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Iohn Deane, dwelli[n]g iust vnder Temple barre
Edw: Allde
